name: Moneypenny Live Chat
author: Moneypenny

sections.description: This plugin makes it easy to install and use Moneypenny LiveChat on your WordPress site. Please note: You will need to be a Moneypenny LiveChat client before you can get this plugin to work.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation:

  • You can install this plugin directly from your WordPress dashboard’s ‘Plugins’ section. Go to Plugins > Add New and search for Moneypenny LiveChat

Manual Installation:

  • Unzip contents of this .zip file to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

After Installation:

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ section in WordPress.
  2. Go to MP Live Chat
  3. Check enable. Type in your Moneypenny Widget ID.
  4. Enter your GTM code if you wish to track some events.
  5. Click “Save Changes”
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Automatic Installation:

  • You can install this plugin directly from your WordPress dashboard’s ‘Plugins’ section. Go to Plugins > Add New and search for Moneypenny LiveChat

Manual Installation:

  • Unzip contents of this .zip file to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

After Installation:

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ section in WordPress.
  2. Go to MP Live Chat
  3. Check enable. Type in your Moneypenny Widget ID.
  4. Enter your GTM code if you wish to track some events.
  5. Click “Save Changes”
